airframe.name: TurntableUsb
airframe.makefile:
ARCH=lpc21
FLASH_MODE = IAP
MB=firmwares/motor_bench
main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCH)
# uncomment the next line to set the number of steps the encoder has (default 256) #main.CFLAGS += -DNB_STEP=256
main.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"boards/olimex_lpc_h2148.h\" -I$(MB) main.CFLAGS += -DPERIPHERALS_AUTO_INIT main.srcs = $(MB)/main_turntable.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c main.srcs += mcu.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_arch.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_FREQUENCY='512.' -DSYS_TIME_LED=1 main.srcs += mcu_periph/sys_time.c $(MB)/turntable_systime.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_USB_SERIAL main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/usb_ser_hw.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbhw_lpc.c $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbinit.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbcontrol.c $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbstdreq.c main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=usb_serial
main.srcs += subsystems/datalink/downlink.c subsystems/datalink/pprz_transport.c
